{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Synology RT1900ac Wireless Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.synology.com/en-global/products/RT1900ac |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Synology |model = RT1900ac |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = (R1) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1900 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = YOR-RT1900AC, YOR-RT1900ACR1 |icid = 20954-RT1900ACR1 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM58622; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A9 |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- 1.0 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Toshiba;THGBMBG5D1KBAIT; |flash1size = 4 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = STMicro;ST25P80VG; |flash2size = 1 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B2G1646Q-BCK0; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:11:32 |oui = 00:11:32
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = CFE;;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = SD Card slot |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amplifier (PAM);Skyworks;SE2623L;;3; ,,, 2.4GHz Low Noise Amplifier (LNA);Skyworks;SKY15971;;3; ,,, 2.4GHz (0.5-6GHz) SPDT Switch;Skyworks;SKY13377;;3; ,,, 5GHz Front End Module (FEM);RFMD;RFFM4552;;3; ,,, USB 2.0 Interface Flash Card Reader Controller;Genesys;GL836;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = <!-- Leave blank --> |defaultssid = SynologyRouter |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 06/17/2015 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B01773J9JU |asin_country = US |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43460;BCM43460KMLG, TE1449 P20, 436287-29 3 W; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam1 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad1ac = 1300 |rad1n = 450 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43460;BCM43460KMLG, TE1449 P20, 436287-29 3 W; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = 450 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *"08-04ETB0113", "ETB01E5" and "Rev:1.3" is silkscreened on the board. *"08-04ETB0118", "ETB01L5" and "Rev:1.8" is silkscreened on the [https://ftp.smallnetbuilder.com/images/stories/wireless/synology_rt1900ac/synology_rt1900ac_board_r1_topsoff.jpg '''R1''' board].
Per the [https://fccid.io/YOR-RT1900AC FCC] EUT's label, a 00:11:32 OUI is assumed to be used :for at least some devices.
See also [[Synology RT2600ac]]..
==Links of Interest== [https://www.synology.com/en-global/products/RT1900ac#spec Specifications]
===Reviews=== *[https://ftp.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32960-synology-rt1900ac-router-reviewed ''Synology RT1900ac Router Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-news/32848-synology-formally-announces-its-wireless-router ''Synology Formally Announces Its Wireless Router'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :CPU: [[Broadcom]] [http://linuxgizmos.com/cortex-a9-soc-targets-linux-based-nas-devices-and-80211ac-routers/ BCM58622] @1GHz Dual-Core (ARM Cortex A9) :RAM: 256MB (DDR3), Flash: 4 GB (eMMC) + 1 MB (SPI [CFE]) :WLAN: 2x BCM43(4)60 radios, 3x external removable antennas :LAN: GbE 1x WAN and 4x LAN ports (embedded GbE switch) :USB/SD: 1x USB 3.0 port and SD card reader *[http://www.shadowandy.net/2015/10/synology-rt1900ac-review-introduction.htm ''Synology RT1900ac Review'' on '''ShadowAndy'''] :Processor: [[Broadcom]] BCM58622 (Dual Core @1GHz) :Memory: 256MB (DDR3), Flash: 1MB, Storage: 4GB (eMMC) :Switch: [[Broadcom]] BCM58622 (10/100/1000 Mbps) :Radio 2.4/5 GHz: 2x [[Broadcom]] [http://www.broadcom.com/products/Wireless-LAN/802.11-Wireless-LAN-Solutions/BCM43460 BCM43460] *[http://www.techbang.com/posts/39435-group-fai-netcom-markets-the-first-step-the-introduction-of-rt1900ac-wireless-router ''Synology RT1900ac Review'' on '''Techbang'''] :Flash: [[STMicroelectronics]] 25P80VG :USB 2.0 Dual SD/MMC/MS Card Reader Controller: [http://www.genesyslogic.com/jp/product_view.php?show=7 Genesys GL836] *[http://openitforum.pl/index/recenzje/routery/pozostale/synology-router-rt1900ac-r248/ ''Synology RT1900ac Review'' on '''Openitforum'''] *[https://lesterchan.net/blog/2015/12/14/synology-router-rt1900ac-review/ ''Synology RT1900ac Review'' on '''LesterChan''']
===Forum threads=== *[http://www.snbforums.com/threads/synology-rt1900ac.27166/ ''Synology RT1900AC'' on '''SNB''' forums] *[http://forums.whirlpool.net.au/archive/2456071 ''Synology RT1900ac'' on '''Whirlpool''' forums] *[http://forums.hardwarezone.com.sg/internet-bandwidth-networking-clinic-4/synology-wireless-router-rt1900ac-dual-band-1-9gbps-5015329.html ''Synology RT1900ac'' on '''HardwareZone''' forums] *[http://www.mobile01.com/newsdetail.php?id=17430 ''Synology RT1900ac'' on '''Mobile01''' forums] :Flash: [[Winbond]] [http://www.datasheet4u.com/datasheet-pdf/Winbond/25P80/pdf.php?id=718369 W25P80VG] 1MB (8Mb) SPI :[[Toshiba]] [http://toshiba.semicon-storage.com/eu/product/memory/nand-flash/mlc-nand/emmc.html THGBMBG5D1KBAIT] 4GB (32Mb) eMMC *[http://digiland.tw/viewtopic.php?id=2741 ''Synology RT1900ac'' on '''DigiLand''' forums]
===See also=== *[[Synology RT1900ac]] *[[Synology MR2200ac]] *[[Synology RT2600ac]] *[[Synology RT6600ax]]
